about_the_game:
Fathoms is a 2D vehicle-based action-adventure game set in a deep underwater facility.

Headphones Recommended




GAMEPLAY


In this game, you will pick up weapons and upgrades for your ship as you progress through the facility with the main goal of escaping.

Items and ammo pickups are limited (much like classic survival horror games). Only shoot when you feel you have to.

Other than managing ammo for weapons and energy for your ship's life gauge, you will also need to manage your ship's oxygen. Throughout the facility there are many spikes that can puncture your ship, making your oxygen gauge drop. Much like loss of energy, a full loss of oxygen will result in a Game Over, bringing the player back to the first area.




CONTROLS


ARROW KEYS for Movement

X is for the Action Button

TAB to switch from Windowed Mode and Full Screen Mode

C for Identify/Interact (only when the game gives the option)

Z to switch Weapons

SPACE to Reload (only for certain weapons)

short_description: Hop into a ship and escape! With the help of an aquatic ally, you pilot an underwater vessel in an attempt to escape the clutches of the Sea Intelligence Bureau.
